# Setup

1. Install Homebrew

```shell
/bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)"
```

2. Install yadm

```shell
brew install yadm
```

3. Setup symlinks

```shell
yadm alt
```

4. Bootstrap with yadm
```shell
yadm bootstrap
```

Restart & Enjoy
